boofcv.abst.feature.disparity

Interface StereoDisparitySparse<Image extends boofcv.struct.image.ImageGray>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    WrapDisparitySparseSadRect

    public interface StereoDisparitySparse<Image extends boofcv.struct.image.ImageGray>

    Computes the disparity between two rectified images at specified points only.

    NOTE: Unlike for dense images, the returned disparity is the actual disparity. No need to add minDisparity to the returned value.

    See Also:
    StereoDisparity

      • process

        boolean process(int x,
                int y)
        Calculates the disparity at the specified point. Returns true if a valid correspondence was found between the two images.
        Parameters:
        x - center of region x-axis
        y - center of region y-axis
        Returns:
        true if a correspondence was found
